page.title: 02Playground Games
page.content: AT SCHOOL I LIKE TO PLAY"POLO" WITH MY FRIENDS.YOU MUST HAVE FOUR OR MORE PLAYERS.ONE PERSON IS "ON" AND THE OTHERS ARE WAITING FOR THE PERSON WHO IS "ON" TO SAY, "A BASKET FULL OF ---," BIKES FOR EXAMPLE.THEN THE OTHERS HAVE TO THINK OF A BRAND NAME AND SOMEONE SHOUTS THEM ALL OUT.THEN THE PERSON WHO IS "ON" PICKS, WHICH-EVER ONE SHE PICKS, THE PLAYER WHO HAD PICKED THAT NAME BEFORE HAS TO RUN TO WHERE THE PERSON WHO WAS "ON" STANDS,AND BACK AND THE PERSON WHO WAS "ON" HAS TO RUN TO WHERE THE OTHERS ARE STANDING, THEN BACK TO WHERE SHE STARTED AGAIN. WHEN THEY PASS THE LINE WHERE THEY STARTED THEY SHOUT "POLO".THE ONE WHO SHOUTS "POLO" FIRST IS "ON". THEN THEY START AGAIN. SANDRA FISHBURN.
